name: ICScannerDeviceDelegate
desc: Methods for determining availability, selecting a functional unit, and performing scans on connected scanners.

items.name: func scannerDeviceDidBecomeAvailable(ICScannerDevice)
items.desc: Tells the client when another client closes the current open session on the scanner.

items.name: func scannerDevice(ICScannerDevice, didSelect: ICScannerFunctionalUnit, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the client when a functional unit is selected on the scanner.

items.name: func scannerDevice(ICScannerDevice, didCompleteOverviewScanWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the client when the scanner completes an overview scan.

items.name: func scannerDevice(ICScannerDevice, didCompleteScanWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the client when the scanner completes a scan.

items.name: func scannerDevice(ICScannerDevice, didScanTo: ICScannerBandData)
items.desc: Tells the client when the scanner receives the requested scan progress notification and a band of data is sent for each notification received.

items.name: func scannerDevice(ICScannerDevice, didScanTo: URL)
items.desc: Tells the client when the scanner receives the requested scan.
